title: @ Riot I think my main acct. was hacked
body: i went to log in today and apparently my password no longer works and i would recover it however i made the acct back around the time leblanc first was revealed no idea how long ago that was but i dont know and or might not even have access to the email in which the acct was made. . . .any way riot can fix this for me cause honestly i have poured a lot of money into my main account and have been a loyal player for many years.

replies.body: You don't need to have access to your original signup email, just fill out our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to submit an email you do have access to.  Our account team will help out and do their best to restore access to your account!  Hang tight!
